description:
Haruto tries to stop J, but J continues to walk toward the pillar of light. The others could do nothing but stare in shock, as J walked over to Mikuni. J was supposed to be their friend, but he was seemingly going to join Mikuni and head back into time, and this world would disappear. The final showdown was about to begin...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Thousand Years, a Hundred Years
